name: brreg
title: The Brønnøysund Register Centre Search
description: Search and retrieve information about Norwegian companies from the Central Coordinating Register for Legal Entities in Norway (Enhetsregisteret)
author: kakaoduft

commands.name: brreg-search
commands.title: Brreg Search
commands.description: Search for Norwegian companies by name or organisation number

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
